message: Let's split the money 60/40. This is a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
I think 55/45 is a fair deal, considering the inflation!
I'll accept your previous offer, but with us reversed. The inflation is cutting into my gains, Bob!
Inflation is on my side, I'll take a bit more this time!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm willing to split 50/50, even with the inflation working against me.  Take it or leave it!
